explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the adherence to self-monitoring of blood glucose (SMBG) among type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM) and pre-diabetes patients, using a cross-sectional survey based on the information-motivation-behavior skills (IMB) model. It does not mention or involve any machine learning techniques, algorithms, or models, nor does it discuss any of the listed keywords related to machine learning, deep learning, or large language models.
